scripts.build: npm run b-river && npm run b-river-nodejs
scripts.ln-river-nodejs: cd modules/river-nodejs && npm ln @protoboard/river && npm ln
scripts.pi-river: npm run ln-river && npm run i-river
scripts.pi-river-nodejs: npm run ln-river-nodejs && npm run i-river-nodejs
scripts.postinstall: npm run pi-river && npm run pi-river-nodejs
scripts.test: npm run t-river && npm run t-river-nodejs
